PSCT.Vegas:
① Once per turn, during your opponent's turn: You can send 1 "Hieratic" monster from your Deck to the GY. 
② Once per turn, during your turn: You can target 1 of your banished "Hieratic" monsters; return it to the GY. ③ If this face-up card on the field is sent to the GY: Target 1 "Hieratic" monster in your GY; Special Summon it.
